Items.name: Looter's Handbook
Items.description: Chests' appearance matches the treasure they hold: purple chests have progression and items green chests have useful items. WARNING: Traps can be in chests of any color.

Type.name: Spectral Flame
Type.description: Allows you to use the explore ability for: Spectral Wolf, Spectral Toad, Spectral Eagle, Spectral Lion
